Class Items

  • java.lang.Object
    • Items
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cosmetic, Electronic, OfficeSupplies

    public abstract class Items
extends java.lang.Object
    The Items class has features which every item has.

    Muhammet Selcuk Guvel
